description.narrative: The revised project development objective is to increase access to improved irrigation systems in the project areas of Mahmoudia, Manaifa and Meet Yazid located in the Nile Delta, in an equitable manner.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1.A., paragraph 1 | Description :The Borrower shall maintain throughout the duration of theProject a Project Steering Committee and a Project Management Unit, as detailed in the POM, at all times acceptable to the Bank. |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1.A., paragraph 2 | Description :Not later than one month after the Effective Date, theBorrower shall, through EALIP, furnish to the Bank the POM on terms acceptable to the Bank. | Due Date :19-Oct-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1.A., paragraph 3 | Description :The Borrower shall establish by not later than June 30,2011 a monitoring and evaluation system designed under terms of reference acceptable to the Bank. | Due Date :21-Sep-2012
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1.A., paragraph 3 | Description :The Borrower shall provide adequate training to staffresponsible for M&E of the Project activities. | Due Date :21-Sep-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1.A., paragraph 4 | Description :The Borrower shall by June 30, 2013 furnish the results ofthis procurement assessment to the Bank for its review and comments. | Due Date :30-Jun-2013

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1.A., paragraph 4 | Description :The Borrower shall carry out an assessment, based on a TORacceptable to the Bank, of the following procurement methods: force account, community based procurement and community basedcontracting | Due Date :30-Jun-2013

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1.A., paragraph 4 | Description :The Borrower shall integrate the recommendations from theprocurement assessment as they shall have been agreed upon with the Bank to enhance these contracting schemes. | Due Date:31-Jul-2013

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1.A., paragraph 5 | Description :The Borrower shall ensure the Project follows theprovisions of Guidelines on Preventing and Combating Fraud and Corruption and related modifications agreed upon between theBorrower and the Bank | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1.B., paragraph 1 | Description :The Borrower shall implement the EMP in a manner acceptableto the Bank and ensure that the Project is carried out in accordance with the provisions of the EMP as referred to in the Appendix.| Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: Area with higher-value horticultural crops grown (number of feddan)
Monitoring and evaluation system established and applied
Irrigation operating and maintenance cost reduced
Operational water user associations created and/or strengthened (number)
Technologies demonstrated in the project areas (number)
Area provided with irrigation and drainage services (ha)
Area provided with irrigation and drainage services - Improved (ha)
Targeted clients satisfied with agricultural services - male (number)
Targeted clients satisfied with agricultural services - female (number)
Targeted clients satisfied with agricultural services (percentage)
Water users provided with irrigation and drainage services - female (number)
Water users provided with new/improved irrigation and drainage services (number)
Ratio of water availability (in cubic meters/hour) measured at tail and head ends
